QuestData.Title: Culling the Damned
QuestData.Description: The cave beyond was swarming with Cult atrocities. There is only one way to deal with such creatures... you know what to do.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 3 Burning Depths Necromancers, 6 Smoldering Constructs, and 6 Smoldering Geist in the Maw of Neltharion, and then return to Serinar.
QuestData.CompletionText: I cannot help but wonder whether they are naive enough to think that I will abide this or if they are simply suicidal.
QuestData.RewardText: Hearing their screams... watching the last life fade from their wretched bodies... it's invigorating, is it not?$B$BI relish it.
